Address.label: Address
Address.value: NO. 109, PAZHOU AVENUE,8TH FLOOR, M PLAZA, GUANGZHOU, 510000, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: MINISO Group Holding Ltd is a retailer offering a variety of design-led lifestyle products. The company's product categories include home decor, small electronics, textile, accessories, beauty tools, toys, cosmetics, personal care, snacks, fragrance and perfumes, and stationery and gifts. Its segment includes MINISO brand and TOP TOY brand. The company generates maximum revenue from MINISO brand segment. Geographically, it derives a majority of its revenue from China.
